reviews.review: Ah mano jogo m√≥ bom joga ai men

Excellent game that has a competitive aspect that no other game really has. Unfortunately this amazing game is stained by rampant cheaters, poor built in matchmaking servers and ranking system, and little support by valve. However, if you decide to use services such as Faceit or ESEA, this takes care of all of those issues and makes for a much better competitive experience.

Overall this game is a 7/10 if you just play matchmaking and nothing else, and a 9.5/10 using one of the clients mentioned above.
